resources.string:
Hi My Name is Akshat Datt. 

 I love to play video games. 

Mostly PC Games like Ghost of Tsushima, God Of War, Call of Duty, Red Dead Redemption. 

 I am Software Developer, working in a SAAS company named "Crackle Technologies". 

I work in different technologies, like Unity, Kotlin, and currently i am learning android Studio and Rust. 

I practice problems on LeetCode as well. 

I love to eat different kind of cuisines, my favorites are parantha and missi roti. 

My biggest supporters are my parents and the love of my life
